00030 #include <swkey.h>

00059 class CSwordLDKey : public SWKey, public CKey {
00060 public: 
00064     CSwordLDKey(  CSwordModuleInfo* module );
00065     ~CSwordLDKey();
00070   virtual bool setKey( const QString );
00074   virtual void NextEntry( void );
00078   virtual void PreviousEntry( void );   
00082   void setModule( CSwordModuleInfo* module );
00086   const QString getKey() const;
00090   virtual  operator const char*();
00094   const QString getStrippedText() const;
00098   const QString getRenderedText() const;
00102   QString m_data;
00106   CSwordModuleInfo* m_module;

00111 inline bool CSwordLDKey::setKey( const QString key ){
00112     SWKey::operator = ((const char*)key.local8Bit());       
00113     m_module->module()->SetKey(*this->clone());
00114     (const char*)*(m_module->module()); //snap to entry
00115     SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());
00116     
00117     return !(bool)error;
00118 }
00119 
00121 inline void CSwordLDKey::NextEntry(){
00122     m_module->module()->SetKey(*this->clone()); //use this key as base for the next one!        
00123     ( *( m_module->module() ) )++;
00124     setKey(m_module->module()->KeyText());
00125 }
00126 
00128 inline void CSwordLDKey::PreviousEntry(){
00129     m_module->module()->SetKey(*this->clone()); //use this key as base for the next one!        
00130     ( *( m_module->module() ) )--;
00131     setKey(getKey());
00132 }
00133 
00135 inline const QString CSwordLDKey::getKey() const {
00136     return QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText());
00137 }
00138 
00140 inline CSwordLDKey::operator const char*(){
00141     return getKey().local8Bit();
00142 }
